This attack consists of a quick, precise thrust of the user's palm to the opponent's body. The attack sends [[chakra]] into the area of the foe where struck to either stun them, or if a more sufficient amount of chakra is used, cause severe internal damage.

== Trivia ==
* {{translation|"Shōtei"|掌底|lit meaning=palm bottom}} is short for {{translation|"Shōteiuchi"|掌底打ち|lit meaning=palm bottom strike}}, a technique that is usually translated as "[[Wikipedia:Open-hand strikes|palm heel strike]]" and basically consists of hitting the opponent with the thick part of the palm closest to the wrist.
* While unnamed in the manga, it was named in the anime.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 192</ref>
